title: Life on the U.S.-Mexico Border
description:
After a long and dangerous journey, thousands of Central American migrants are now living in camps just outside the U.S.-Mexico border in Tijuana waiting to learn what happens next. David Meyers speaks to Bloomberg's Andrea Navarro, who is reporting from Tijuana on the conditions the migrants are living in and their uncertain future. 
FOLLOW UP
You can follow Andrea at: @andreanavarror 
----
 TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
